summary: This small mod adds five new treasure maps for the player to find and loot. The maps are poorly hand-drawn and unintentionally meant to look like they were hastily scribbled down by someone hiding their treasure in a rush.
descriptionHtml:
This small mod adds five new treasure maps for the player to find and loot. The maps are poorly hand-drawn and unintentionally meant to look like they were hastily scribbled down by someone hiding their treasure in a rush.

If you find a treasure map, remember that you need to read it for the loot container to actually spawn. They will not appear in the world otherwise.

I\'ve included a seperate file, _clumodSpoilers.txt which contains all the locations of the treasure maps if you\'re struggling to find them. I would only recommend looking at this if you\'re only interested in the loot though!

Each loot container has randomly generated levelled loot in it.

New items:
Treasure map XI
Treasure map XII
Treasure map XIII
Treasure map XIV
Treasure map XV

[youtube]GEnZPXjMLYk[/youtube]

This mod does not require any DLC.

There are no currently known compatibility issues, if you have any specific concerns please tell me and I will investigate.

To install this mod, download the .rar and use the nexus mod manager. Or you can drop the .esp and .bsa files into your Data directory if you don\'t use the mod manager.

Created by mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger. Be sure to check out my profile for my other mods, or my youtube channel if you want to be kept up to date with what I\'m working on.

=============
RELEASE NOTES
=============

========================
v1.0.0
========================

Date of release: 05/06/2013
Purpose: Initial release
Notes: Five new treasure maps will spawn in the world.
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

========================
author: IrksomeBadger
